title: Reclaimed
description: Jade Two weeks ago I thought the worst was over. Now, I’m trapped in a cage and a woman I never knew existed has taken over my life.  Aiden Two weeks ago I began to lose the girl I loved. Something had changed in her, and no matter how much I didn’t want to believe it, the reality was that Jade was turning into the monster she feared she would become.  Angel Jade never knew I existed, and now she is going to pay for it.
author: Kelly Carrero
